reference.title: The node icons are the wrong size
reference.shortdesc: The node icons are either too big or too small. I cannot see the DITA map very well.

refbody.section: ProblemYou need to increase or decrease the size of the icons to accommodate the DITA map.

section.title: Solution
section.p: To decrease the node size, press Ctrl+[.
To increase the node size, press Ctrl+].
